incident_updates.body:
• 2013-08-15 15:47:18 - Major service outage.
  • 2013-08-15 15:50:44 - We are working to mitigate a large DDoS. We will provide an update once we have more information.
  • 2013-08-15 16:24:54 - We are still working to mitigate a very large DDoS attack. The site is now available for some users but we will remain in red status until we're confident the site is staying up.
  • 2013-08-15 16:56:39 - The site continues to be operational, however we are going to keep the status at yellow while we continue to monitor closesly and work with our upstream providers.
  • 2013-08-15 17:30:41 - The site continues to be operational, however we plan to leave the status at the yellow level while we perform additional configuration adjustments. We are discontinuing periodic status updates at this time, but will provide updates if the situation changes.
  • 2013-08-15 18:15:57 - GitHub.com is unavailable again. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible.
  • 2013-08-15 18:29:17 - The site is again available. We are very sorry for the continued problems but are working hard to defend against ongoing attacks.
  • 2013-08-15 19:26:44 - At this time, one of our Elasticsearch clusters is currently unavailable. This will affect the ability to sign up new accounts and modify organization membership.
  • 2013-08-15 20:28:04 - Issue, User, and Repo search are currently disabled. We are working to restore service.
  • 2013-08-15 21:52:38 - Everything operating normally.

components.name: Git Operations
components.description: Performance of git clones, pulls, pushes, and associated operations
